title.rendered: Vintage Sublimated Baseball Jersey two button

content.rendered:
Premium Quality Material and Style

Our Vintage Sublimated Baseball Jerseys are crafted from 100% polyester, ensuring a durable and lightweight fabric perfect for athletic performance. The two-button placket design adds a touch of classic style while providing easy wearability. The mesh paneling offers excellent breathability, keeping athletes cool and comfortable during intense games. With a reliable fit, our jerseys are designed to enhance performance and comfort.

Advanced HD Sublimation and Customization

We use modern HD sublimation techniques to deliver vibrant, long-lasting prints that cover the entire jersey. Our state-of-the-art sublimation process ensures that the colors remain vivid and the design stays sharp even after multiple washes. We offer extensive customization options, including labeling and branding on demand, allowing you to create unique jerseys that represent your team’s identity perfectly.

Wide Range of Colors and Sizes

Our jerseys are available in any color of your choice, ensuring you can match your team’s colors accurately. We offer a comprehensive size range from S to 3XL, accommodating players of all sizes. Whether you need a single jersey or bulk orders, our production capacity can meet your demands efficiently with a minimum order quantity of just 40 jerseys.

Superior Finishing and Durability

Each jersey is finished with quality flatlock work and neat seams, ensuring durability and a polished appearance. The high-quality construction guarantees that our jerseys can withstand the rigors of regular use, maintaining their look and functionality over time. Trust our expertise in manufacturing and supplying premium sublimated jerseys that combine performance, style, and longevity.

excerpt.rendered:
Retro design emulating classic baseball uniforms. Personalized with team names, logos, or player details.

  • Material : 100% Polyester
  • Style : Two Button Placket
  • Durability : Mesh paneling | Reliable fit
  • Embellishment : Modern HD sublimation
  • Print Options : Overall
  • Customization : Labeling & branding on demand
  • Color : Any/On demand
  • Finishing : Quality Flatlock Work With Neat Seams
  • Sizes : S to 3XL (Available on demand)
  • MOQ : 40
